wordpressPost.title: Riding Into November
wordpressPost.content:
Hi Stryde Community,

There is a lot of excitement here at Stryde and we are thrilled to finally share it all with you!

GIVE A BIG WELCOME TO PRIME CYCLE

Prime Cycle is joining the Stryde community from Hoboken, NJ with full-body, cycling workouts that are choreographed rhythm riding. Their dedicated and experienced team will guide you through 20, 30, 45 or 60 minute workouts that will PUSH you to your limits and work you to the core. Keep an eye out on the app for new classes from them!

NEW APP FEATURES

We already have, or are getting set to rollout several new app and tablet features that we know you will love. What are they? Here, a list of what you can look forward to seeing on your screens:

Picture in picture which enables you to see your stats while using another app

The ability to favorite classes

View trending classes

BEGINNER CLASSES ARE HERE!

These rides are geared toward if itâ€™s your first time riding and to make you feel comfortable on the bike. You can look forward to being guided through a breakdown of the movements all while getting your sweat on. Check them out on the app today!
